description: This file contains variables that will be set in SSM.

production.LOGIN_WHITELIST: ...set to comma separated list of emails that can access the app...
production.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_ADMIN_TEAM_IDS: ...set to comma separated list of Synapse team IDs...
production.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_FOLDER_NAMES: ...set to comma separated list of folder names...
production.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_WIKI_PROJECT_ID: ...set to the Synapse project ID to copy the wiki from...
production.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_CONTRIBUTION_AGREEM: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update contribution agreement data...

staging.LOGIN_WHITELIST: ...set to comma separated list of emails that can access the app...
staging.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_ADMIN_TEAM_IDS: ...set to comma separated list of Synapse team IDs...
staging.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_FOLDER_NAMES: ...set to comma separated list of folder names...
staging.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_WIKI_PROJECT_ID: ...set to the Synapse project ID to copy the wiki from...
staging.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_CONTRIBUTION_AGREEM: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update contribution agreement data...

development.LOGIN_WHITELIST: ...set to comma separated list of emails that can access the app...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_ADMIN_TEAM_IDS: ...set to comma separated list of Synapse team IDs...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_FOLDER_NAMES: ...set to comma separated list of folder names...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_WIKI_PROJECT_ID: ...set to the Synapse project ID to copy the wiki from...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_CONTRIBUTION_AGREEM: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update contribution agreement data...
